title: TKG Green Recruiting
body:
TerraKnights Green is currently recruiting for all positions.
Pref Diamond 5+

Available every Monday and Thursday plus other days with notice.
Fill out this form if you are interested in applying:
https://goo.gl/forms/GGaMkJo4PPq9tmb83

For any more info, contact us at our Facebook Page or via Email: Terraknightsgaming@gmail.com

Thanks,
